label: WeightUnitMeasureType
comment: The numeric value determined by weight measuring.

referencedBy.comment: The measure of the explosive cargo weight applicable to these transported dangerous goods.
The gross weight measure specified in this exchanged declaration.
The maximum stackability weight applicable to these handling instructions.
The measure of the total gross weight (mass) of all cargo loaded onto this logistics means of transport, including packaging but excluding any associated transport equipment.
The deadweight tonnage measure for this logistics transport means.
The measure, at line level, of the theoretical weight of this trade delivery.
A weight for which this calculated emission is measured.
